bibl.title: Edge of Empires: Pagans, Jews, and Christians at Roman Dura-Europos. [Exhibition Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University, September 23, 2011 - January 8, 2012.]
bibl.seg: Chi Jennifer Y. and Sebastian Heath (Edd.), Edge of Empires: Pagans, Jews, and Christians at Roman Dura-Europos. [Exhibition Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University, September 23, 2011 - January 8, 2012.]
New York, Institute for the Study of the Ancient World at New York University (Diffusion: Princeton University Press, Princeton, NJ), 2011. ISBN 978-0-691-15468-8.
